title: Got my new computer, finally converted to SSD. Decent build.
body:
Literally what the fuck is this speed? Why is it even legal for a computer to operate this fast? I click a webpage and it opens. I can actually watch cute kitty videos while league patches. I am currently patching league, downloading microsoft office, installing itunes, listening to youtube stuff, and talking shit on discord all at once. What the fuck? My former computer would've become incapable of movement once league started patching. This is insane. 

Sorry, I'm just gushing over this. I finally treated myself after 8 years, and I'm beyond excited. By the way, I graduate in May. So that's cool.
